content: That's a great idea! A live makeup tutorial on YouTube can be a fantastic way to engage with your audience and provide valuable content. Since you've been getting questions about your skincare and beauty routine, this type of content is likely to resonate with your audience. Just make sure to plan your tutorial carefully, choose a specific theme or focus, and prepare your products and tools beforehand. Also, don't forget to encourage interaction and respond to questions and comments from your audience in real-time. Good luck!
